title: Sea bass en croute with Puy lentils
description: A lighter alternative to the traditional Wellington. Dill pancakes separate the filling from the pastry to keep it crisp.
ingredients: 350g/12oz unsalted butter, chilled and cut into cubes
½ small red onion, finely chopped
salt and freshly cracked black pepper
2 tbsp lemongrass, tough outer leaves removed and inner stalks well chopped
salt and freshly cracked black pepper
2 x 150g/6oz sea bass fillets, skin and pin-bones removed
